General.Name: Kung Sing Engineering Corp
General.Description: Kung Sing Engineering Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Taiwan. Its projects include bridges, residential buildings, airports, roads, subways, tunnels, and railways. The company develops houses and buildings, as well as provides repairing of roads and bridges services. In addition, it is involved in dredging, rust-protection, drilling, waste disposal, and fitting out work services. Further, the company engages in window and door installation, interior decoration, light steel frame works, glass installation, kitchenware, bathroom equipment, and painting work services. Additionally, it provides water, piping, electrical, air conditioning, and fire equipment related services. Furthermore, the company is involved in civil projects, residence and factory lease, community development, land levy, real estate trading and rental services. It also engages in cement and concrete product, rail vehicle and transportation accessories business, as well as construction material, machine, and equipment sales. The company was incorporated in 1941 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
